name: PatioKingdom 9FT Patio Outdoor Umbrella-UPF 50+ Sun Shade with Wind Vent, Push-Button Tilt & Smooth Crank Lift, Rust-Resistant Fiberglass Frame for Garden, Backyard,Yard
short_description: ✔️【All-Day UV Protection & Waterproof】Stay cool under the 9FT UV-resistant outside umbrella made of 100% high-density polyester. Blocks 99% harmful rays and repels rainwater, perfect for summer. Covers 4-6 chairs and a table. Ideal for: Backyard BBQs, poolside lounging, beach trips, and outdoor cafes ✔️【Windproof Design with 8 Fiberglass Ribs】Reinforced with 8 rust-proof fiberglass ribs + powder-coated iron pole for maximum stability. Top wind vent reduces sway and keeps airflow cool. 30% lighter than steel frames ✔️【Push Button Tilt & Smooth Crank System】Adjust shade angles in seconds with the one-hand crank lift and 360° tilt button. No struggling – opens/closes in under 10 seconds. Perfect for seniors and busy commercial spaces ✔️【Commercial-Grade Durability】Built for heavy-duty use: Waterproof fabric resists fading, fiberglass won’t rust in salt air (beach-safe!), and iron pole holds up in 35+ mph winds. Trusted by restaurants, hotels, and pool clubs ✔️【Versatile for Any Outdoor Space】Modern minimalist design blends with patios, gardens, decks, or café terraces. Dimensions: 9ft coverage (108’’), 7.5ft pole height. Sets up in 5 mins

name: Yaheetech 7.5FT Solar Patio Umbrella-18 LED Lighted Market Table Outdoor Umbrella w/UV Protection Push Button Tilt & Crank Lift System for Garden/Lawn/Deck/Backyard/Pool,Tan
short_description: Strong & Stable: This patio umbrella consists of a 7.5ft canopy made of water-resistant polyester, 6 metal ribs and an anti-rust powder-coated metal pole with a 1.5” diameter. A wind-vented canopy enhances the stability of the umbrella on windy days. Convenient crank lift & Tilt adjustment: The crank market umbrella is effortless to operate by turning the crank lever. The umbrella canopy can be manually tilted in 2 directions with a push at the button to create a more flexible and versatile shade. 18 solar-powered LED lights: There are 18 LED lights strung along the powder-coated ribs for additional lighting. They are powered by the top solar panel and a solar AA rechargeable battery and have a run time of 8 hours after a full charge. A handy switch on the pole controls the lights. Elegant outdoor addition: With this LED umbrella, you can have a nice and cool shade that protects you from the unrelenting sun, and enjoy the ambiance the solar lights bring when the cozy night comes. A great addition to the patio, garden, deck, poolside, café and restaurant. Easy-peasy assembly: This garden umbrella only takes you a few minutes to set up, just unpack and take out the umbrella and base pole, stabilize the base pole to a stand/base (not included), insert the canopy to the base pole and your garden table umbrella is ready to use.

name: Greesum 9FT Patio Umbrella with Push Button Tilt and Crank, Outdoor Table Umbrella with 8 Sturdy Ribs, Market Table Parasol for Garden, Lawn, Backyard & Pool, Without Base, Black
short_description: Intuitive Adjustment System: The push-button tilt function enables precise angle adjustments with just one hand. This smart design lets you perfectly position your shade throughout the day as the sun moves across the sky. Premium UV Protection Canopy: Crafted from high-density 100% polyester, our canopy delivers superior sun defense with UPF 50+ protection that blocks 98% of harmful UV rays. You'll enjoy cool, comfortable shade that stands up to seasons of outdoor use. Heavy-Duty 8-Rib Construction: Engineered with powder-coated steel ribs and frame for exceptional stability and wind resistance. Smart Outdoor Living Solution: Transform any outdoor space into a comfortable retreat with this multifunctional shade provider. Whether you're hosting backyard gatherings, enjoying poolside relaxation, or operating a café, this umbrella combines practical functionality with stylish appeal. Weather Usage Advisory: While engineered for durability, this umbrella is designed for fair weather use only. We strongly recommend closing and securing the canopy during rain, snow, or wind to ensure safety and prolong the product's lifespan. Proper care in inclement weather will maintain optimal performance year after year. This product does not come with a base. If you need a base, you can purchase ASIN: B0CYC7Z74Q.

name: wikiwiki 9 FT Patio Umbrellas Outdoor Table Market Umbrella with Push Button Tilt/Crank, 8 Sturdy Ribs, Fade Resistant Waterproof POLYESTER DTY Canopy for Garden, Lawn, Backyard & Pool, Cream Beige
short_description: UPGRADED ECO-FRIENDLY &RECYCLED FABRIC: This maket umbrella has a GRS certified canopy that is made of recycled Polyester Draw-Texturing-Yarn. This PU coated canopy has a US Standard AATCC 16 Grade 5 colorfastness to light, the thick high quality material provides excellent UV resistance, water proofing and fade resistance.
